Text:
This is for Kontakt - PC and for MAC users too !
Great and realistic piano sound ! Thanks Anonymous for great upload! :)

I've got a problem. When I follow the instructions for installation PDF file included in the torrent, Piano in Blue still doesn't work for me. Kontakt gives me the message "The patch could not be loaded (Unknown error)" even after I do exactly as the instructions say. Am I missing something? I'm using Kontakt ver. 4.2.4.
Hopefully the V2 update is on the way... curious to see how good the changes are. Such a great sampled piano.
